title: Le Sang de la Vigne
overview: An internationally renowned expert on French wines, whose guide to the vintages of Bordeaux is eagerly-awaited each year, finds that he has a nose for solving crimes, initially assisting Police Inspector Barbaroux and later operating on his own as an amateur sleuth. Based on the books by Jean-Pierre Alaux and NoÃ«l Balen, all published by Fayard.
